description:
Tree Works Application in Tree Works Application in Barnsbury Conservation Area, 24 Thornhill Square Islington London N1 1BQ

An application was received to do the following tree works to the rear of the above property:

Rear Garden:

-	Mimosa
o	Fell to ground level and treat stump
-	Fig
o	Prune to previous reduction points, leaving as many side shoots and buds as possible, to facilitate a health recovery.  Remove deadwood and reshape to leave a shape and form
-	Pear
o	Prune to previous reduction points leaving as many shoots and buds as possible, remove deadwood in the crown and reshape to leave a natural shape.
-	Cherry
o	Reduce back to previous reduction points, leaving as many shoots and buds as possible, to facilitate a healthy recovery, removal of deadwood and reshape to leave a natural shape
-	Cherry
o	Reduce back to previous reduction points, leaving as many side shoots and buds as possible, leaving a natural shape and form.
